alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Kearney; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 07 at 10:38AM CDT until April 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Buffalo, Hall, Hamilton, Kearney, Adams, Clay, Fillmore, Nuckolls and Thayer Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will aide in blowing dust potential today with visibility reductions expected. Localized areas of significantly reduced visibility will be possible. Be prepared for rapidly changing visibility in areas where blowing dust is occurring. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Kearney; Nuckolls; Thayer
